item.title: Jupyter Learning Note_005
item.description: ## How to clone GitHub repository to [google colab](https://colab.research.google.com/) Follow the steps below. mount google drive from google.colab import drive drive.mount('/content/drive') create a repository in the location specified by git clone import shutil import os # Change current directory os.chdir('/content/drive/My Drive') cur_dir = os.getcwd() git_name ='/MongoDB_PyMongo_Tutorial' git_folder = cur_dir + git_name #Delete if it exists if os.path.exists(git_folder): shutil.rmtree(git_folder) #Clone !git clone https://github.com/Giffy/MongoDB_PyMongo_Tutorial.git Implementation result
